title: Push-ups
description:
Lie face down on the ground.
Put your palms next to your chest and spread them out.
While maintaining a straight body, use your hands to raise yourself off the ground. Your feet should remain on the floor.
Once your hands are almost straightened out, lower yourself back down without touching the floor
. This is one rep; repeat as many times as you like.
